title: Pricing
description: Featuring your products in our search results can significantly boost visibility and sales. Here's why you should feature your products with ingreed.io:

features.title: Increase Visibility
features.description: Increase your product's visibility to a highly targeted audience.

features.title: Competitive Edge
features.description: Gain a competitive edge over other brands.

features.title: Reach Customers
features.description: Reach customers actively looking for products like yours.

features.title: Affordable
features.description: Only $1 per day to feature your product and maximize your exposure.
